list-head-warning: Please add at least one item

table.search-empty-result: No matches found. Try a valid product code or keyword.
table.search-field-placeholder: Enter Product Name or Item Number
table.add-to-cart-error-description: Please check the items and quantity in cart
table.add-to-cart-warning: Please add at least one product

upload-order.title: Upload Your Products
upload-order.import-instructions: Follow these steps to import multiple products using a .CSV, .XLSX or .ODS file
upload-order.template-download: Click here to download the template.{{fileType}}
upload-order.enter-product-ids: Enter product ids in Column A and required QTY in Column B. Please do not include any prefix, dash or other punctuation in the id.
upload-order.save-and-upload: Save the file to your computer (recommended .CSV format) and upload it to the platform.

paste-order.title: Paste Your Products
paste-order.instructions: Copy and paste your order with the item number, quantity (and optionally units), separated by spaces, semicolons or commas.
paste-order.invalid-format-description: Invalid format. Please ensure the format is 'Supplier Product #/Customer Code, Qty'.

import-validation.title: Import Validation
import-validation.success-count: {{count}} products were successfully imported, and please check the ones with error.
import-validation.product-quantity-not-correct: The product qty is not correct

validate-action.increment-quantity: Quantity must be a multiple of {{increment}}
